name: A Day Life in A Malay Village.
description: The largest ethnic group in Malaysia is the Malay. Labu Kubong is a hometown, where the villagers are still practising Malay tradition, maintaining the old lifestyle of the Malays. It is completely different from the Malay lifestyle in the city. You can see how different their life is, as the village is free from urbanisation. This is one of the things I wanna share, with all the pros and cons. Even if you're a Malaysians, this might be quite an interesting experience for you. And this particular village, is in KUALA KANGSAR...
